resources.string: Toggle preferences that can be used to bypass root detection when adding virtual cards.
Toggle preferences that can be used to bypass ANZ GoMoney\'s root detection and have the ability to spoof your device to enable GoMoney Wallet (NFC Payment).
Toggle preferences that can be used to bypass Semble\'s root detection, device spoofing and also bypass \"OS not Supported\" messages for Lollipop and above users.
Toggle preferences that can be used to bypass TVNZ onDemand\'s Root Detection checks when watching a onDemand video.
Toggle preferences that can be used to bypass 3NOW\'s Root Detection checks when entering the application.
Toggles logging which can be helpful when troubleshooting. Can reduce performance drastically due to constant reloading of data files therefore only enable if you actually need this feature.
Displays helpful information about the module, troubleshooting etc.

You can contact me using any of the methods below where you can send me feedback, bug reports, feature requests or to simply follow me on social media for updates.\n\nRemember to actually write an actual message when contacting me! You\'d be surprised how many people emailed me with no message.
Enable this to avoid root detection messages for the when adding virtual cards in the ASB Mobile app.
Enable this to avoid root detection for the ANZ GoMoney app.
Spoofs your device information (to be shown as a Samsung Galaxy Note 3) which may allow GoMoney Wallet to work. This function is limited to your phone\'s hardware and software capabilities.

Allow screenshots to be taken within the ANZ GoMoney application. Do not turn on this feature unless you actually need it at it\'s huge security breach. If you indeed do use this feature, make sure no sensitive information is displayed when you screenshot.
Enable to bypass the various root checks found in the Semble applications.

Bypass the \"OS not supported\" message on Semble-supported devices that have newer Android OS version installed which Semble was not designed to be used on. Handy for Marshmallow or Lollipop users and users of Custom ROMs.

Spoofs your device information (to be shown as a Samsung Galaxy Note 3) which will bypass \"Device Not Supported\" messages and may allow Semble services to work. This function is limited to your phone\'s hardware and software capabilities. Made for devices that are not on the Semble Compatibility list.
Enable to bypass the various root checks found in the TVNZ onDemand application.
Enable to bypass the various root checks found in the 3NOW application.
You MUST clear all cache and data of the ANZ GoMoney application and re-login in order fro your changes to be in effect. So keep your Account Number and password on hand.

In order to spoof your device you must clear all cache and data of the ANZ GoMoney application and re-login otherwise the spoofing feature will not activate. So keep your Account Number and password on hand.
